subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Roy Jones Jr. is a former world champion in four weight classes and considered one of the top pound-for-pound fighters in boxing history.  He is training for his fight against Prince Badi Ajamu.
snippet: Roy Jones Jr. is a former world champion in four weight classes and considered one of the top pound-for-pound fighters in boxing history.  He is training for his fight against Prince Badi Ajamu.
